translation.it: - "Spogliarelliste incinta"! - "Nani neri con libri"!

translation.en: -"Unnatural Animal Love." -"Literacy in Inner-City Schools."
translation.it: - "Amore tra animali"! - "Cultura in periferia"!

translation.en: Shit! Take it back. Take it back.
translation.it: Cazzo. Ritiralo. Ritiralo.

translation.en: She was just kidding.
translation.it: Stava scherzando.

translation.en: And I tried to pretend I was.
translation.it: E feci finta di aver scherzato.

translation.en: First the doorbell, then the staff meeting?
translation.it: Prima il campanello, poi la riunione.

translation.en: I am absolutely mortified.
translation.it: Sono mortificata.

translation.en: Don't worry, no one will remember.
translation.it: Tanto nessuno se lo ricorderà.

translation.en: -You can ring my bell -Hey, stop it!
translation.it: - Puoi suonare il mio campanello! - Piantala!

translation.en: -Ring my bell -She's really upset.
translation.it: È davvero sconvolta.

translation.en: Oh, please. I'm the only victim here.
translation.it: Qui l'unica vittima sono io.

translation.en: Why should I be forced to share credit with--?
translation.it: Perché devo spartire il merito con...

translation.en: -Not fair. -Your midget idea was tired.
translation.it: - Non vale. - La tua idea era noiosa.

translation.en: -His twist made it different. -Thanks, I feel so much better.
translation.it: - Lui l'ha trasformata. - Grazie, ora sto meglio.

translation.en: If you make sweeps even with shared credit, that's a huge deal.
translation.it: Se aumentate gli ascolti in due, è un affarone.

translation.en: I happen to know that the people from Harpo, Oprah's group...
translation.it: So che alcuni della Harpo, il gruppo di Oprah,

translation.en: ...TiVo every one of our shows.
translation.it: registrano il nostro show.

translation.en: For what it's worth, I really like your "Little Black Book" idea.
translation.it: Mi è piaciuta l'idea del libretto nero.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah. So don't cry in my soup.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Sì. Perciò non lamentarti.

translation.en: -So how does it all work exactly? -You put your best shows in sweeps.
translation.it: - Come funziona di preciso? - Rispolveri le tue idee migliori.

translation.en: The most outrageous, the most provocative attention-grabbers.
translation.it: Quelle provocatorie che attirano di più l'attenzione.

translation.en: -Then they promo it. -It's about getting eyeballs...
translation.it: - E le promuovi. - È questione di audience.

translation.en: ...to get numbers, to get revenue, to get renewed.
translation.it: Di numeri, di guadagni, di novità.

translation.en: We're beginning sweeps now, so things are in the can.
translation.it: Servono ascolti, quindi siamo tutti in fermento.

translation.en: -So, what was pitched today? -June sluts.
translation.it: - Oggi di che si parlava? - Giugno.

translation.en: Slots. Of which we average nine a month.
translation.it: Noi calcoliamo nove pezzi al mese.

translation.en: "We" being the drones. The APs. When an AP gets a slut-- Slot.
translation.it: "Noi", i produttori. Per ogni idea accolta, una tacca.

translation.en: It's like a credit. You need so many credits to advance.
translation.it: È come un credito. Più ne ottieni, più avanzi.

translation.en: -And you have the most? -Catching on.
translation.it: - E tu ne hai di più? - Esatto.

translation.en: He's next. The only way to jump ahead of him is if you land the live show.
translation.it: Puoi superarlo solo se scelgono la tua idea per una diretta.

translation.en: -Please. -This month?
translation.it: - No! - Questo mese?

translation.en: -A week from Friday. -APs never get the live show.
translation.it: - Entro una settimana. - Nessuno ha mai avuto la diretta.

translation.en: -Karen Meskil. -Urban legend.
translation.it: - Karen Meskil. - Balle!

translation.en: Anyway, if you do, you're instantly promoted.
translation.it: Se ci riesci, verrai subito promossa.

translation.en: -Wow. -Hi, Barbara.
translation.it: - Cavolo! - Ciao, Barbara.

translation.en: Hey, Kippie. Great show.
translation.it: Ehi, Kippie! Gran bella puntata!

translation.en: Let's not go there. You must be Stacy.
translation.it: Non ne parliamo. Tu devi essere Stacy.

translation.en: Wow. I am so unbelievably sorry about what happened.
translation.it: Sono mortificata per quello che è successo.

translation.en: Please. Let he who is without sin cast the first stone.
translation.it: Ma no! Chi è senza peccato, scagli la prima pietra!

translation.en: Hello again.
translation.it: Rieccoti...

translation.en: -Nachlis. -Yes, you are.
translation.it: - Nachlis. - Certo, tu.

translation.en: So sorry to hear about you and Neil. I thought he was a keeper.
translation.it: Mi dispiace per te e Neil. Pensavo che sarebbe durata.

translation.en: -Sorry. Excuse me. -Bye.
translation.it: - Scusate. - Arrivederci.

translation.en: -Who's Neil? -My boyfriend.
translation.it: - Chi è Neil? - Il mio ragazzo.

translation.en: Ex, actually.
translation.it: Ex, in realtà.

translation.en: "Hi, Barbara. How's Neil? You must be Stacy."
translation.it: "Ciao, Barbara. Come sta Neil? Tu devi essere Stacy."

translation.en: What's missing here? Oh, me!
translation.it: Chi manca? Ah sì, io!

translation.en: You're right. I should get as many shows on the air as possible. Be seen.
translation.it: Hai ragione. Devo ottenere più show possibili, essere visto.

translation.en: Noticed by somebody. Anybody.
translation.it: Notato da qualcuno. Chiunque.

translation.en: Okay, so, what I'm about to do should not be interpreted as groveling...
translation.it: Ciò che sto per fare non va visto come umiliante,

translation.en: ...hypocrisy, or desperation. It's merely a loss of personal integrity.
translation.it: ipocrita o disperato, è solo una perdita di integrità.

translation.en: Excuse me. Larry, wait up!
translation.it: Scusate. Larry, aspetta!

translation.en: -He's funny. -Yeah. Talented too.
translation.it: - È simpatico. - Sì. E ha talento.

translation.en: Okay, I'll do the midgets.
translation.it: Ok, farò i nani.

translation.en: -Too bad he'll never make it here. -Why not?
translation.it: - Peccato che qui non sfonderà mai. - Perché?

translation.en: He cares too much what everyone thinks. Especially Kippie.
translation.it: Tiene troppo a ciò che dice la gente. Soprattutto Kippie.

translation.en: -And that's bad because...? -They're shopping for a newer model.
translation.it: - Ed è un male perché... - Hanno deciso di sostituirla.

translation.en: -But she's the boss. -It's been in the works a long time.
translation.it: - Ma lei è il capo. - È in programma da tanto tempo.

translation.en: Who do you think leaked the pictures to the tabloids?
translation.it: Chi credi abbia inviato le foto ai giornali?

translation.en: Her ratings are down, and she's got five years left on her contract.
translation.it: I suoi ascolti sono in calo e ha ancora 5 anni di contratto.

translation.en: You do the math.
translation.it: Fatti i conti.

translation.en: -So is it always like this? -I don't know.
translation.it: - È sempre così? - Non lo so.

translation.en: I haven't been here long enough to say.
translation.it: Sono qui da troppo poco.

translation.en: -No, I thought you were-- -A lifer?
translation.it: - Pensavo fossi... - Una veterana?

translation.en: No. A year and a half ago I was on Wall Street.
translation.it: No. Un anno e mezzo fa ero a Wall Street.

translation.en: And before that I drove a bus.
translation.it: Prima conducevo un autobus.

translation.en: It's all pretty much the same.
translation.it: È tutto uguale.

translation.en: People will tell you who they are if you just listen.
translation.it: La gente ti dice chi è, se tu la ascolti.

translation.en: You can figure them out. Sometimes you can help.
translation.it: Puoi capirli e a volte aiutarli.

translation.en: -Let's help Kippie. -I should warn you.
translation.it: - Aiutiamo Kippie. - Ti avverto.

translation.en: I'm uncomfortable with touching and sentiment.
translation.it: Odio i sentimentalismi e venire toccata.

translation.en: -Sorry. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Scusa. - Grazie.

translation.en: It's all about the bottom line.
translation.it: C'entra sempre il profitto.

translation.en: -In every business. -Does she know?
translation.it: - In ogni lavoro. - Lei lo sa?

translation.en: She used to be prime-time out of New York.
translation.it: Faceva la prima serata da New York.

translation.en: Now she's syndicated in Jersey.
translation.it: Ora trasmette dal New Jersey.

translation.en: It's one thing to start here, but you don't climb your way to Trenton.
translation.it: Un conto è iniziare qui, ma finire a Trenton...

translation.en: Nothing we can do, short of winning sweeps.
translation.it: Decide solo l'audience.

translation.en: -Well, then let's win sweeps. -Oh, okay.
translation.it: - Allora aumentiamola. - Ok!

translation.en: -We could try. -Win one for the Kipper?
translation.it: - Tentiamo. - Per Kippie?

translation.en: -Please. -This is too earnest for me.
translation.it: - Ti prego. - Tu sei troppo candida.

translation.en: You've been teetering, and you just crossed over.

translation.en: -Don't you like her? -I do, actually.
translation.it: - Non ti piace? - In realtà, sì.

translation.en: A lot. But that's irrelevant.
translation.it: Tanto. Ma è irrilevante.

translation.en: That may be so, but does it reveal who your true friends are?
translation.it: Forse è così, ma vi svela chi sono i vostri veri amici?

translation.en: Are they keeping secrets?

translation.en: Well, it's not a secret anymore for someone...
translation.it: Non è più un segreto per qualcuno

translation.en: ...and we'll tell you why after these words.
translation.it: e vi diremo perché dopo la pubblicità.

translation.en: Hey!
translation.it: Ehi!

translation.en: Man, you should have seen what came out of this animal.
translation.it: Dovevi vedere cos'è uscito da questo cane.

translation.en: I miss all the good stuff.

translation.en: -Think you're pretty cute, don't you? -Well, I'm no Bob.

translation.en: You better apologize.

translation.en: I think you just insulted Bob.

translation.en: -You insinuated ugliness. -I did not. I did not.
translation.it: - Hai insinuato che sia brutto. - Non è vero.

translation.en: -Apologize. -Okay, okay! I'm sorry, Bob. I'm sorry.
translation.it: - Chiedi scusa. - Ok! Scusa, Bob. Mi dispiace.

translation.en: -Wait. Where are you going? -I gotta finish packing. Two minutes.
translation.it: - Dove vai? - A fare le valigie. Due minuti.

translation.en: Did I tell you about Nieuwendyk's cousin? MVP out of Detroit?

translation.en: Guess who he's seeing Friday morning. His request.

translation.en: Honey, this fast-forward thing isn't working.

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -What?
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio! - Che cosa?

translation.en: -Oh, it's the gas. -Oh, God!
translation.it: - È solo un peto. - Oddio!

translation.en: -Bob, get down. Come here, boy. -Open a window. Honey....
translation.it: - Bob, giù. - Apri la finestra.

translation.en: Yeah, plus Robbie Moore, out of Buffalo?
translation.it: Più Robbie Moore, di Buffalo.

translation.en: These guys are, like, the top two recruits in the country.
translation.it: Sono i due migliori sul mercato.

translation.en: And if I can nail them both....

translation.en: No ifs. You will. I know it.

translation.en: -Oh, what is the matter with that Bob? -Burrito.
translation.it: - Che cos'ha Bob oggi? - Sono i burritos.

translation.en: -Want me to take him out? -Later.
translation.it: - Lo porto fuori? - Dopo.

translation.en: -I can do it right now. -No.
translation.it: - Vado? - No.

translation.en: Positive?
translation.it: Sicura?

translation.en: Jesus wept! Bob!

translation.en: No more hot sauce, all right?

translation.en: -Why are you feeding him hot sauce? -I don't know.

translation.en: -What are you watching? -Oh, Kippie.
translation.it: - Che stai guardando? - Kippie.

translation.en: -I'm studying the format. -Tell us how bulimia...
translation.it: - Studio il format. - Perché la bulimia

translation.en: -...affected your relationships, Lulu. -I lost them all.
translation.it: - ha rovinato i tuoi rapporti, Lulu? - Ho perso tutti.

translation.en: My agent. My friends. My boyfriends.
translation.it: Il mio agente.

translation.en: -Lulu? -Fritz.
translation.it: - Lulu? - Fritz.

translation.en: -The supermodel. -I was so ashamed.
translation.it: - La top model. - Mi vergognavo.

translation.en: I knew it.

translation.en: I knew she barfed.

translation.en: -Oh, that documentary. -No, I mean I heard her.
translation.it: - Ah, il documentario. - No, l'ho sentita.

translation.en: You heard Lulu Fritz barfing?

translation.en: Yeah, couple times. Nasty.

translation.en: What?

translation.en: You don't feel compelled to explain further?

translation.en: We dated. A little. I told you that, didn't I?

translation.en: Let me think. No.
translation.it: Fammi pensare... No.

translation.en: Thought I did. Are you gonna be cool staying here by yourself?

translation.en: -You'll walk Bob? -Sure.
translation.it: - Porterai fuori Bob? - Sì.

translation.en: Don't let him walk you. Who's the boss?

translation.en: -Me. -Tell him that.
translation.it: - Io. - Diglielo.

translation.en: -I'm the boss, Bob. -You hear that, Bob?
translation.it: - Comando io, Bob. - Capito, Bob?

translation.en: -You never mentioned her. -Who?

translation.en: Because we don't sit around talking about past relationships.

translation.en: She was a relationship.

translation.en: -I guess you just forgot to mention-- -This is why I hate talking about this.

translation.en: It's history. It's over. The past is past.

translation.en: You know, I don't pry into your old boyfriends.

translation.en: Here's a little tip: I never dated Brad Pitt.

translation.en: All right. Shut it off, okay?

translation.en: Look, I've had really bad experiences...

translation.en: Hallelujah
translation.it: Alleluja!

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay.
translation.it: - Ok? - Ok.

translation.en: -Bob hates it when we fight. -We're not fighting.

translation.en: -Tell him. -We are not fighting, Bob.
translation.it: - Diglielo. - Non stiamo litigando, Bob.

translation.en: So no more Lulu Fritz?

translation.en: I will never mention the name "Lulu Fritz" again.
translation.it: Non nominerò mai più Lulu Fritz.

translation.en: -Lulu Fritz. -No.
translation.it: - Lulu Fritz. - No!

translation.en: -And he never told you? -The past is past.
translation.it: - Non te l'ha mai detto? - Il passato è passato.

translation.it: - "Amore animale" tra 5 minuti. - L'ha detto lui?

translation.en: We made an agreement not to discuss old relationships.

translation.en: -Renegotiate. -No.
translation.it: - Ritratta. - No.

translation.en: Those who do not learn from his history are condemned to repeat it.

translation.en: Doesn't matter who he dated. What matters is why he stopped.

translation.en: -What's he do? -He works for the Devils.
translation.it: - Che fa? - Lavora nei Devils.

translation.en: -Who doesn't? Kidding. -Think about it hypothetically.
translation.it: - Come tutti! Scherzo. - Facciamo un'ipotesi.

translation.en: Say Derek's like Neil. Hypothetically.

translation.en: How do you find out before you're too far gone? He won't say:

translation.it: "Mi sono fatto tutta la rubrica."

translation.en: -"And I only got to K." -He'll say:
translation.it: "Fino alla K".

translation.en: -"The past is past." -Right.

translation.en: -Good point. They'll always give dirt. -No, that's not what I mean.

translation.en: I haven't met them.
translation.it: Non li conosco.

translation.en: He doesn't bring girls home.

translation.en: -He just doesn't. -Can I ask...
translation.it: - Non lo fa mai. - Posso sapere

translation.en: ...you ever think of appealing this decision? Meeting the folks?
translation.it: se hai mai discusso questa decisione?

translation.en: I don't wanna make him feel uncomfortable.
translation.it: Non voglio metterlo a disagio.

translation.en: Yeah. Let's not do that. That'd be bad.

translation.en: -Stop it! -What century are you in?
translation.it: - Smettila! - Ma in che secolo vivi?

translation.en: You have a right-- Nay, an obligation to find out more.

translation.en: He's away for, what, two weeks? Take that time, I beg you.

translation.en: Learn a few things. Anything. Information's power.
translation.it: Cerca di scoprire qualcosa. Sapere è potere.

translation.en: -Feels dishonest. -That's because it is.
translation.it: - Mi sembra scorretto. - Lo è.

translation.en: You wanna keep your man, you find out why they didn't.

translation.en: -I thought you stopped. -I have.

translation.en: Look, I agree. There's better ways to do it.

translation.en: -It'd be great if you could ask him-- -Or the folks.

translation.en: Since no one argues with the lord and master, you gotta get creative.

translation.en: All men should come with letters of recommendation, or warning labels.

translation.it: - Non è vero. - Allora aprilo e indaga.

translation.en: Speaking of which, what was Lulu's last name?

translation.en: Fritz. Why?

translation.en: -What's that? -Vintage. Working Girl, 1988.
translation.it: - Cos'è quello? - "Una donna in carriera", 1988.

translation.en: -Good movie? -It's a great movie.

translation.en: You've never seen it?

translation.it: Una ragazza di Staten Island che si fa strada nella città

translation.en: -...on her own terms. -Melanie Griffith, huh?
translation.it: - a modo suo. - Melanie Griffith, eh?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Has she never heard of call waiting?

translation.en: He's a genius.

translation.en: Plus, he's married to Diane Sawyer.
translation.it: E poi, è sposato con Diane Sawyer.

translation.en: -Who you wanna be. -Ringing!

translation.en: Ladies.
translation.it: Signore.

translation.en: I don't wanna be her, Barb. I wanna work with her.

translation.en: I will work with her. I believe I will.
translation.it: E ci riuscirò. Ne sono certa.

translation.en: -I believe you will too. -Hello, Lulu Fritz?

translation.en: Ira Nachlis. Senior associate producer/producer, Kippie Kann Do.
translation.it: Ira Nachlis. Produttore associato senior di Kippie Kann Do.

translation.en: Listen, "I Model, Then I Barf Quietly"...
translation.it: "Faccio la modella e vomito in silenzio"

translation.en: -...is one of our highest-rated shows. -What are you doing?
translation.it: - è uno dei nostri... - Che fai?

translation.en: I am trying to give a young innocent her 15 minutes of fame. Now--

translation.en: I'm sorry. Lulu...

translation.it: Puoi venire domani per un'intervista?

translation.en: Excellent. We'll do lunch and throw up-- Catch up.

translation.en: I would love to expose myself to your viewers.
translation.it: Mi piacerebbe mostrarmi al vostro pubblico.

translation.en: Okay. Not going there.

-...voilà! -Voilà what?

translation.en: Bob, I want you to move in really tight.

translation.en: Yeah. Right there.

translation.en: But, in a way, we're just closer being friends.

translation.en: He bought us each one, and we promised never to throw them away.

translation.en: So no matter what happened, if we needed to, or wanted to...

translation.en: Anyway, whatever.

translation.en: You know, he probably wouldn't even remember the story...

translation.en: How stupid is that?

translation.en: It's just a waste of energy.

translation.en: Wouldn't that be funny?

translation.en: Right now I'm not rushing into anything or anyone.

translation.en: Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice....

translation.en: -Shame on me. -Exactly.
translation.it: - È colpa mia. - Esatto.

translation.en: Something about the way she believed she might get him back...

translation.en: ...made me believe it too.

translation.en: Thanks, pal.

translation.en: Hey!
translation.it: Ciao!

translation.en: I'm home!

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey. I heard you from downstairs.

translation.en: -You did? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Davvero? - Sì.

translation.en: Yikes. Was I that loud?
translation.it: Strillavo tanto?

translation.en: No, you sounded great. Kind of sad, though. Everything okay?
translation.it: No, eri eccezionale. Un po' triste però. Tutto ok?

translation.en: Yeah. You know, work issues, but I'm fine.
translation.it: Sì. Qualche problema al lavoro, ma sto bene.

translation.en: -You're home early. -You say that like that's a bad thing.
translation.it: - Sei tornato prima. - Lo dici come se fossi scontenta.

translation.en: No! No, no, no.
translation.it: No! No, no.

translation.en: I just didn't expect you, that's all.
translation.it: È solo che non ti aspettavo.

translation.en: What happened to the other guy?
translation.it: Che cosa è successo?

translation.en: A mouse.
translation.it: Un topo.

translation.en: -A mouse did this? -Yeah.
translation.it: - È stato un topo? - Sì.

translation.en: There was a mouse, and, you know, Bob freaked...
translation.it: C'era un topo e... ecco, Bob si è messo paura e...

translation.en: -...and forget about it. -A mouse scared Bob?
translation.it: - Lasciamo stare. - Paura di un topo?

translation.en: Went crazy. You wouldn't believe it.
translation.it: È impazzito. Non ci crederai.

translation.en: He chased him onto the answering machine...
translation.it: Lo ha inseguito sulla segreteria.

translation.en: ...where the mouse just, like, taunted and taunted Bob.
translation.it: Il topo ha cominciato a provocare Bob, a istigarlo.

translation.en: So I ran and I got your stick, your hockey stick...
translation.it: Così ho preso la tua mazza da hockey

translation.en: ...and I just smashed it.
translation.it: e l'ho schiacciato.

translation.en: -You smashed a mouse? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Hai schiacciato un topo? - Sì.

translation.en: No, like I would smash a mouse.
translation.it: No, come se fossi capace di farlo!

translation.en: He got away, but I scared him good.
translation.it: Ma l'ho spaventato ed è scappato.

translation.en: I don't think he'll be coming back.
translation.it: Non credo che tornerà.

translation.en: -He carry my box down too? -That's very funny.
translation.it: - Ha tirato giù lui la mia scatola? - Che ridere!

translation.en: No, I did.
translation.it: No, sono stata io.

translation.en: I was looking for another phone.
translation.it: Cercavo un altro telefono.

translation.en: Which you found, in a closed box marked "personal stuff."
translation.it: Che hai trovato in una scatola con scritto "oggetti personali".

translation.en: No offense, Derek, but you're not exactly Mr. Organized.
translation.it: Senza offesa, Derek, ma non sei proprio un uomo ordinato.

translation.en: -You're a mess. -All right, all right.
translation.it: - Sei un casino. - Ok, ok.

translation.en: Don't go criticizing homie. Homie just got home.
translation.it: Non criticarmi. Sono appena tornato.

translation.en: -Yo, I was defending your dog, yo. -Thank you.
translation.it: - Ho difeso il tuo cane. - Grazie.

translation.en: Who gets very sad when you're away.
translation.it: Che è triste quando te ne vai.

translation.en: Very needy.
translation.it: Ha bisogno di te.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah? -He missed you.
translation.it: - Ah, sì? - Gli sei mancato.

translation.en: -He the only one? -No, Joyce missed you too.
translation.it: - Solo a lui? - No, anche a Joyce.

translation.en: So you wanna know why I'm home early?
translation.it: Lo sai perché sono tornato prima?

translation.en: I'm seeing Robbie Moore's parents tomorrow.
translation.it: Domani vedo i genitori di Robbie Moore.

translation.en: -That means you're close. -Bringing the contract.
translation.it: - Quindi ci sei quasi. - Per la firma.

translation.en: -Wait, wait. Tomorrow's the playoffs. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Ma domani ci sono i playoff. - Già.

translation.en: -You're not gonna go? -No.
translation.it: - Non ci vai? - No.

translation.en: If I don't close this kid tomorrow, Terry's gonna sign him.
translation.it: Se non firmiamo domani, lo ingaggerà Terry.

translation.en: I can't miss the opportunity.
translation.it: Non posso farmelo sfuggire.

translation.en: You know what? I'm doing this for both of us.
translation.it: Sai? Lo sto facendo per noi due.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Bob. All of us.
translation.it: Scusa, Bob. Per noi tre.

translation.en: I felt like a lying sack of fertilizer.
translation.it: Mi sentivo come un sacco di concime.

translation.en: Knowing what I knew and not knowing what I didn't...
translation.it: Sapendo ciò che sapevo e non sapendo ciò che non sapevo

translation.en: ...and knowing more than anything that I had to know more.
translation.it: e sapendo più di tutto che dovevo sapere di più.

translation.en: She called all the time, begging him, pleading, pathetic.
translation.it: Lo chiamava sempre, pregandolo, supplicandolo, era patetica.

translation.en: He played me the messages on the machine. They were hysterical.
translation.it: Mi faceva sentire i messaggi sulla segreteria. Era isterica.

translation.en: She was desperate.
translation.it: Era disperata.

translation.en: One angry chef, coming up.
translation.it: Chef arrabbiato in arrivo.

translation.en: I can't show her that.
translation.it: Non può vederlo.

translation.en: I'd be purposely hurting a friend.
translation.it: Farei del male a un'amica di proposito.

translation.en: Knowledge is a terrible and a marvelous thing.
translation.it: Il sapere è terribile e meraviglioso.

translation.en: It just depends on your perspective.
translation.it: Dipende dalla prospettiva.

translation.en: Think of it this way.
translation.it: Vedila così.

translation.en: If she knew who you really were, she'd hate you.
translation.it: Se sapesse chi sei, ti odierebbe.

translation.en: Can you blame her?
translation.it: Puoi biasimarla?

translation.en: And, Stace?
translation.it: E, Stacy?

translation.en: She's not your friend.
translation.it: Non siete amiche.

translation.en: Have fun at the game.
translation.it: Goditi la partita.

translation.en: Hi, I'm sorry I'm late. I was in the middle of a crisis with Derek.
translation.it: Ciao, scusa il ritardo. Derek ha avuto una crisi.

translation.en: I'm helping him with something.
translation.it: Lo sto aiutando.

translation.en: Doesn't he have someone else to help, like a girlfriend?
translation.it: Non ha qualcun altro? Tipo, una fidanzata?

translation.en: Probably a bunch. But....
translation.it: Ne avrà parecchie.

translation.en: We agreed not to discuss anyone we date, unless one of us was serious.
translation.it: Ma abbiamo deciso di parlare di chi frequentiamo solo se è una storia seria.

translation.en: Then we have to, but he's not, and I'm not.
translation.it: Ma né lui né io ce l'abbiamo.

translation.en: So why torture each other? You know, it's just too painful for both of us.
translation.it: Perciò perché torturarci a vicenda? Sarebbe troppo doloroso per entrambi.

translation.en: Sorry, that's my cell.
translation.it: Il mio cellulare.

translation.en: Hello? Hey, I was just talking about you.
translation.it: Pronto? Ciao, stavo giusto parlando di te.

translation.en: So, what happened?
translation.it: Che è successo?

translation.en: You might think it odd that I didn't strangle her...
translation.it: È strano che non l'abbia strangolata

translation.en: ...as I watched her flirt and coo with my man.
translation.it: mentre flirtava e tubava col mio uomo.

translation.en: But I didn't.
translation.it: Eppure non lo feci.

translation.en: I was strangely drawn to their banter.
translation.it: Ero attratta dalle loro risate.

translation.en: Curious about this part of his life...
translation.it: Mi incuriosiva quest'amicizia

translation.en: ...that I had been completely dumb to just a few days earlier.
translation.it: di cui non sapevo nulla fino a pochi giorni prima.

translation.en: They had a past.
translation.it: Avevano un passato.

translation.en: -They had a present separate from me. -They scored. Listen.
translation.it: - Avevano un presente lontano da me. - Hanno segnato!

translation.en: Can you hear?
translation.it: Lo senti?

translation.en: She didn't know he had a girlfriend, but she didn't want to.
translation.it: Lei non sapeva che lui aveva una ragazza, e non voleva saperlo.

translation.en: Suddenly, I knew what I had to do.
translation.it: D'un tratto, capii cosa dovevo fare.

translation.en: Finally I asked him to go back to his old girlfriend.
translation.it: Alla fine gli ho chiesto di tornare dalla sua ex.

translation.en: She called all the time, begging him, pleading.
translation.it: Lo chiamava sempre, pregandolo, supplicandolo.

translation.en: -She was desperate. -Joyce?
translation.it: - Era disperata. - Joyce?

translation.en: -How'd you know her name? -You mentioned it.
translation.it: - Come fai a saperlo? - L'hai nominata tu.

translation.en: -You did. -She did.
translation.it: - È vero. - Sì.

translation.en: I did?
translation.it: Sul serio?

translation.en: Well, yes. Joyce.
translation.it: Beh, sì. Joyce.

translation.en: He only went back to her out of pity.
translation.it: È tornato con lei solo per pietà.

translation.en: Barb was right.
translation.it: Barb aveva ragione.

translation.en: As soon as Joyce realized that he'd lied to her about Lulu...
translation.it: Appena Joyce capì che le aveva mentito su Lulu,

translation.en: ...she'd never forgive him.
translation.it: decise di non perdonarlo più.

translation.en: Which was, after all, what I'd wanted.
translation.it: Che era ciò che volevo, dopo tutto.

translation.en: So why did I feel so bad?
translation.it: Allora perché mi sentivo male?

translation.en: -I shouldn't have shown you that. -No, I appreciate it, really.
translation.it: - Non dovevo fartelo vedere. - No, hai fatto bene.

translation.en: It's just so bad, you know.
translation.it: Solo che è doloroso.

translation.en: I probably did call him a few times when he was with her.
translation.it: L'ho chiamato un paio di volte quando era con lei.

translation.en: But I was upset. I wouldn't characterize it as being hysterical or pathetic.
translation.it: Ma ero sconvolta. Non mi definirei isterica o patetica.

translation.en: But for her to know...
translation.it: Ma questo significa

translation.en: ...that I called means that he told her.
translation.it: che era lui a dirle che chiamavo.

translation.en: Even if she didn't hear it, she knew, and that's just so bad.
translation.it: Lei non poteva sentirmi, eppure sapeva. Questo fa molto male.

translation.en: Joyce, I'm sorry.
translation.it: Joyce, mi dispiace.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.it: Mi dispiace tanto.

translation.en: -He's in there. -Where?
translation.it: - Lui è lì dentro. - Dove?

translation.en: Right there, with the orange sweater and the stupid haircut.
translation.it: Laggiù, col maglione arancione e lo stupido taglio di capelli.

translation.en: It is stupid.
translation.it: Sì, è stupido.

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.it: Già.

translation.en: We stood there...
translation.it: Ce ne stavamo lì,

translation.en: ...both of us sadly in love with the same man.
translation.it: tristemente innamorate dello stesso uomo.

translation.en: Both of us feeling let down by him.
translation.it: Ci sentivamo entrambe tradite.

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.it: Dove vai?

translation.en: I'm going home. I'll see you tomorrow for the pre-interview. Good night, Barb.
translation.it: A casa. Ci vediamo domani per l'intervista. Buonanotte, Barb.

translation.en: Wait, Joyce?
translation.it: Aspetta, Joyce.

translation.en: Wait. Please. Wait.
translation.it: Aspetta. Ti prego, aspetta.

translation.en: -That tape, the Lulu-- -You know what, it's not about the tape.
translation.it: - La cassetta di Lulu... - La cassetta non c'entra.

translation.en: It's just...
translation.it: È solo che

translation.en: ...talking to you and seeing Lulu. All that stuff brought up bad memories.
translation.it: parlare con te e vedere Lulu, ha risvegliato dei brutti ricordi.

translation.en: And who am I trying to kid, you know?
translation.it: Chi voglio prendere in giro?

translation.en: A clean break is easier. You can reset it...
translation.it: È meglio una rottura netta.

translation.en: ...and it heals, and you move on.
translation.it: Così guarisci e vai avanti.

translation.en: But if you leave things messy or things don't get put right...
translation.it: Ma se lasci le cose in disordine, senza chiarire,

translation.en: ...then it just hurts.
translation.it: poi farà male.

translation.en: Forever.
translation.it: Per sempre.

translation.en: It's really time for me to move away from him.
translation.it: È ora che mi allontani da lui.

translation.en: From all this.
translation.it: Da tutto questo.

translation.en: I don't even know who he is anymore.
translation.it: Non so nemmeno più chi è.

translation.en: I should have felt happier at that moment.
translation.it: Avrei dovuto sentirmi felice.

translation.en: I had won.
translation.it: Avevo vinto.

translation.en: But the cost was high and the victory hollow.
translation.it: Ma il prezzo era alto e la vittoria vuota.

translation.en: I had taken a good friend from someone I loved.
translation.it: Avevo tolto un'amica all'uomo che amavo.

translation.en: And nothing about that felt right.
translation.it: E non mi sembrava giusto.

translation.en: I needed a reality check. I needed Mom.
translation.it: Dovevo fare i conti con la realtà, vedere mia madre.

translation.en: But she was out. So I settled for Carly.
translation.it: Ma lei non c'era. Così optai per Carly.

translation.en: The line between right and wrong had blurred.
translation.it: Il confine tra bene e male era sparito.

translation.en: In my search for truth, I had become the lie.
translation.it: Cercando la verità, ero diventata io la bugia.

translation.en: Perhaps some secrets should remain secret.
translation.it: Forse alcuni segreti dovrebbero restare tali.

translation.en: Okay, you guys are not that bright. Can I have an amen?
translation.it: Ragazzi, non vi vedo molto svegli. Mi fate sentire un amen?

translation.en: Is everything okay?
translation.it: Va tutto bene?

translation.en: It's great. Yeah.
translation.it: Alla grande, sì.

translation.en: -That makes one of us. -What's the matter?
translation.it: - Almeno una di noi sta bene. - Che cos'hai?

translation.en: I'm not feeling so, you know, good.
translation.it: Non mi sento molto bene.

translation.en: You can't go home. I mean, I need you.
translation.it: Non puoi andartene a casa, ho bisogno di te.

translation.en: Today's my show. I'm a nervous wreck. We're live.
translation.it: Oggi c'è la mia diretta, sono nervosissima.

translation.en: Oh, my God. I totally forgot. Of course I'll be here.
translation.it: Oddio, me n'ero dimenticata! Certo che ci sarò.

translation.en: Wouldn't miss it for the world.
translation.it: Non me la perderei mai!

translation.en: You are so beautiful, like a real producer.
translation.it: Sei bellissima, come un vero produttore.

translation.en: Hello. Headset.
translation.it: Ciao. Cuffie.

translation.en: And there was something I needed to tell you. What was it?
translation.it: Dovevo dirti una cosa. Che cos'era?

translation.en: -Oh, right. We're live. -There she is.
translation.it: - Sì. Siamo in diretta. - Eccola.

translation.en: -Yikes. -Showtime.
translation.it: - Cavolo. - Inizia lo show!

translation.en: Great to see you.
translation.it: Che bello vedervi!

translation.en: -Welcome to Kippie Kann Live. -Watch this ladder.
translation.it: - Benvenuti! - Occhio alla scala!

translation.en: I need a running order.
translation.it: Mi serve l'ordine!

translation.en: -Who's on first? -You.
translation.it: - Chi va prima? - Tu.

translation.en: -What? -It's for you.
translation.it: - Cosa? - È per te.

translation.en: -What is? -Everything.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Tutto.

translation.en: Let's see who's at Kippie's door.
translation.it: Vediamo chi suona alla mia porta.

translation.en: Just go with it.
translation.it: Tu valle dietro.

translation.en: Stacy, oh, come on out.
translation.it: Stacy! Coraggio, vieni qui.

translation.en: That's right, Stacy. Make yourself comfortable.
translation.it: Ok, Stacy. Mettiti comoda.

translation.en: You look a little confused.
translation.it: Sembri un po' confusa.

translation.en: -Know the name of today's show? -"Plastic Surgery Nightmares"?
translation.it: - Sai che puntata è oggi? - "Incubi di Chirurgia Plastica"?

translation.en: No. Actually it's called "Little Black Book."
translation.it: No. Veramente si chiama "Il Libretto Nero".

translation.en: Let's fill our audience in on some recent history.
translation.it: Facciamo un riassunto per il pubblico.

translation.en: Stacy's a new member of our staff who's been using resources here...
translation.it: Stacy lavora da poco qui e ha usato le nostre risorse

translation.en: ...to do her own personal research...
translation.it: per fare delle ricerche personali

translation.en: ...on her boyfriend, Derek.
translation.it: sul suo fidanzato, Derek.

translation.en: And three of his ex-girlfriends.
translation.it: E su tre delle sue ex.

translation.en: -Oh, no. -Oh, no.
translation.it: - Oh, no! - Oh, no!

translation.en: Oh, yes.
translation.it: Oh, sì!

translation.en: She went through his little black electronic book...
translation.it: Ha frugato nella sua agenda elettronica.

translation.en: -...found his ex-girlfriends... -I don't believe this.
translation.it: - Ha trovato i numeri delle sue ex. - Non ci credo.

translation.en: ...and interviewed them under the guise of being a guest on our show.
translation.it: Le ha intervistate col pretesto di ospitarle nel nostro show.

translation.en: -That's my idea. -Wow, man, too bad.
translation.it: - È una mia idea. - Mi dispiace.

translation.en: -Barb's upstairs, if you wanna kill her. -And they will be.
translation.it: - Barb è lì, se vuoi ucciderla. - E le ospiteremo.

translation.en: But not for the reasons they thought.
translation.it: Ma non per i motivi che credevano.

translation.en: Take, for example, supermodel Lulu Fritz.
translation.it: Prendiamo ad esempio la top model Lulu Fritz.

translation.en: Welcome to Kippie Kann Live.
translation.it: Benvenuta al Kippie Kann Live.

translation.en: You used us. You took my idea, and you set her up.
translation.it: Ci hai usato. Hai preso la mia idea e l'hai ingannata.

translation.en: -How can you just stand there? -Camera two.
translation.it: - E sei qui tranquilla? - La 2.

translation.en: -You stole my idea. -It's poetry.
translation.it: - Me l'hai rubata. - È pura poesia.

translation.en: -You stole it. -I'll share credit. Ira...
translation.it: - Rubata! - Divideremo i meriti.

translation.en: ...there's a bigger thing happening. Just watch. God, are you watching?
translation.it: Sta accadendo una cosa più grande. Dio, stai guardando?

translation.en: It was all superficial. Completely about sex.
translation.it: Fu una cosa superficiale. Una storia di sesso.

translation.en: I'd have to say no. That's not from my documentary.
translation.it: No, questo non è del mio documentario.

translation.en: That's right, Lulu. It's all a ruse.
translation.it: Esatto, Lulu. È tutta una messinscena.

translation.en: A flower?
translation.it: Sono scema?

translation.en: -A ruse, a joke. This woman... -How can you do this?
translation.it: - Una messinscena, uno scherzo. - Come hai potuto farlo? Stacy Holt, un membro del nostro staff, ti ha attirato qui con una menzogna.

translation.en: ...Stacy Holt, a member of our staff, got you here under false pretenses.
translation.it: Stacy Holt, un membro del nostro staff, ti ha attirato qui con una menzogna.

translation.en: -Her name's Barbara. -No, the woman producing is Barbara.
translation.it: - Il suo nome è Barbara. - No, la produttrice è Barbara.

translation.en: The woman beside you is the current girlfriend of the man you once dated.
translation.it: Quella al tuo fianco è l'attuale ragazza dell'uomo con cui uscivi.

translation.en: -Stephen? -Derek.
translation.it: - Stephen? - Derek.

translation.en: Camera five. Doorbell.
translation.it: La 5. Il campanello.

translation.en: Another woman scorned, and she doesn't even know it yet.
translation.it: Un'altra donna tradita, e ancora non lo sa.

translation.en: Come in, Dr. Keyes.
translation.it: Entri, dott.ssa Keyes.

translation.en: Welcome to Kippie Kann Live.
translation.it: Benvenuta al Kippie Kann Live.

translation.en: Drama, pathos, life unfolding.
translation.it: Dramma, pathos, la vita vera.

translation.en: -It's good. -It's Greek. Go to three, Phil.
translation.it: - Bello. - Tragedia greca. La 3, Phil.

translation.en: -Camera three, go. -Dr. Keyes, you're a gynecologist.
translation.it: - Vai con la 3. - Lei è una ginecologa.

translation.en: This woman posed as a patient...
translation.it: Stacy si è finta una paziente

translation.en: ...to obtain personal information on her boyfriend, whom you once dated.
translation.it: per ottenere informazioni personali sul suo ragazzo, che era un suo ex.

translation.en: But I examined her.
translation.it: Ma l'ho visitata.

translation.en: -Well, that was all a setup. -Even the warts?
translation.it: - Era tutta una farsa. - Anche le verruche?

translation.en: No, it was a joke. There were none, ever.
translation.it: No, era uno scherzo. Non le ho mai avute.

translation.en: Ah, the apex. Joyce. She thinks she's doing a pre-interview for a cook-off.
translation.it: E ora il culmine, Joyce. Crede di essere qui per una gara di cucina.

translation.en: That's what you told her, right, Stace?
translation.it: Le hai detto così, vero?

translation.en: Come in, Joyce.
translation.it: Entra, Joyce.

translation.en: Welcome to Kippie Kann Live.
translation.it: Benvenuta al Kippie Kann Live.

translation.en: Here comes the tough part. You can do it.
translation.it: Ora viene il difficile. Puoi farcela.

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.it: Benvenuta.

translation.en: What's with the audience and all these--?
translation.it: Perché il pubblico è così...

translation.en: -Lulu. -Oh, that's right.
translation.it: - Lulu. - Proprio lei!

translation.en: You two go way back. But what about you two?
translation.it: Vi conoscevate già. Ma che mi dici di lei?

translation.en: -Barb? -No, actually, that's Stacy.
translation.it: - Barb? - No, si chiama Stacy.

translation.en: -Derek's current girlfriend. -What?
translation.it: - L'attuale ragazza di Derek. - Cosa?

translation.en: No cook-off today.
translation.it: Niente cucina oggi.

translation.en: You lied to me? After everything I told you, you lied.
translation.it: Mi hai mentito? Dopo tutto quello che ti ho detto?

translation.en: -Just like she did. -Are you referring to me?
translation.it: - Come lei. - Dici a me?

translation.en: -Shut up. -What did you say?
translation.it: - Stai zitta. - Che cosa hai detto?

translation.en: Ladies, please. Let's fill the audience in, shall we?
translation.it: Signore, per favore! Il pubblico merita una spiegazione.

translation.en: We sent our own Kippie Kann crew to the Kaleidoscope Kitchen...
translation.it: Abbiamo mandato una nostra troupe al Kaleidoscope Kitchen

translation.en: ...posing as a crew for 48 Hours.
translation.it: facendola passare per quella di 48 Ore.

translation.en: -Then that was all a rose, too? -Ruse, yeah. Roll it.
translation.it: - Mi hanno preso per scema? - Una messinscena, sì.

translation.en: -Why is she calling you Stacy, Barb? -Because that's her name.
translation.it: - Perché ti chiama Stacy, Barb? - Si chiama così.

translation.en: No, actually, my name is Barb.
translation.it: No, veramente mi chiamo Barb.

translation.en: The other woman you met's name was Stacy.
translation.it: Stacy è l'altra donna che hai conosciuto.

translation.en: -No, she was Barb. -No.
translation.it: - No, lei era Barb. - No.

translation.en: -What? -Stimulating as ever.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Stimolante, come sempre.

translation.en: I'd say it's nice to see you, but then I'd be lying.
translation.it: Potrei dire che è un piacere vederti, ma mentirei.

translation.en: Enjoy your meal.
translation.it: Buon appetito.

translation.en: I got sick that night, and not on purpose.
translation.it: Sono stata male quella sera, davvero.

translation.en: Stay put for more surprises when "Little Black Book" continues.
translation.it: Rimanete con noi, ci saranno altre sorprese con "Il Libretto Nero".

translation.en: Ladies, stay in your seat, okay. We're still live.
translation.it: Signore, rimanete sedute. Siamo ancora in diretta.

translation.en: -I'm sorry-- -Don't-- Don't say another word.
translation.it: - Mi dispiace. - Non parlare.

translation.en: You wanted me to hate him? Mission accomplished. I do.
translation.it: Volevi farmelo odiare? Missione compiuta. Lo odio.

translation.en: But, as bad as he is, he is still too good for you.
translation.it: Ma per quanto lui sia crudele, è comunque troppo buono per te.

translation.en: -If you could have a seat-- -This is completely unacceptable.
translation.it: - Se potesse sedersi... - Tutto ciò è inaccettabile.

translation.en: I'll sue this entire show for defamation of character.
translation.it: Citerò il programma per diffamazione.

translation.en: This is America, and you are welcome to sue anyone.
translation.it: Siamo in America, può denunciare chi vuole.

translation.en: But that release you signed is ironclad.
translation.it: Ma ha firmato la liberatoria.

translation.en: I was told we'd be discussing sexually transmitted diseases.

translation.en: Sexually transmitted diseases. That's an idea.
translation.it: Malattie veneree. Questa è una buona idea.

translation.en: -Ninety seconds to air. -Ninety seconds.
translation.it: - In onda tra 90 secondi. - 90 secondi.

translation.en: -I love it live. -You stoop to conquer.
translation.it: - Adoro la diretta. - Sei stata meschina.

translation.en: Yeah. I stoop. We all do.

translation.en: I mean, look at where we work.

translation.en: We march thousands of Stacys through here every year.

translation.en: We uncover their secrets. We spare no feelings.

translation.en: But suddenly you get a conscience because you know one personally.

translation.en: -You're unethical. -You're a hypocrite.
translation.it: - Sei immorale. - E tu ipocrita.

translation.en: -I'm a hypocrite? -This show is based on hypocrisy.
translation.it: - Io ipocrita? - Questo show si basa sull'ipocrisia.

translation.en: You wanna call me unethical? Okay.

translation.en: But don't judge me and then worship Kippie for doing the same thing.

translation.en: We're all swimming in the same cesspool.

translation.en: We work in reality TV, Ira. This is reality.
translation.it: Facciamo un reality, Ira. Questa è la realtà.

translation.en: Forty-five seconds to air, Phil.
translation.it: In onda tra 45 secondi, Phil.

translation.en: -Ira. -Underneath your seats...
translation.it: - Ira. - Sotto il sedile

translation.en: ...there's a Kippie Kann Live hat for each one of you. Kippie's a giver.
translation.it: avete un cappello del Kippie Kann Live. È un regalo di Kippie.

translation.en: -I gotta get to the control room. -Carl, you wanna handle this?
translation.it: - Devo andare in sala regia. - Carl, ci pensi tu?

translation.en: -Got it covered here. Thanks. -You're all in on this?
translation.it: - È tutto ok. Grazie. - Eravate d'accordo?

translation.en: -Everyone knew? -There is no conspiracy here.
translation.it: - Lo sapevate tutti? - Non c'è nessun complotto.

translation.en: Just a good idea for sweeps.
translation.it: Solo una buona idea.

translation.en: -You can fight it. Seems pointless. -Lame. Really stupid.
translation.it: - Puoi ribellarti, ma sarebbe inutile. - Molto stupido.

translation.en: Or you could become a part of something bigger.

translation.en: Something completely different. Now, of course I cannot--
translation.it: Qualcosa di completamente diverso. Ora io non posso...

translation.en: But trust me, gonna be big.
translation.it: Qualcosa di completamente diverso. Ora io non posso... Ma fidati, sarà grande.

translation.en: -Huge, it's giant. -I'm talking about a real show here.
translation.it: - Enorme, gigantesca. - Ti sto parlando di un vero show.

translation.en: Changing formats. Breaking the fourth wall, and the fifth.
translation.it: Un nuovo format. Sfonderà il quarto e il quinto muro.

translation.en: Kamikaze television without restriction...
translation.it: La TV kamikaze, senza limiti,

translation.en: ...without hesitation, without Kippie.
translation.it: senza esitazioni, senza Kippie.

translation.en: It's a pretty exciting time to be on the ground floor.

translation.en: Thanks, Carl. But being that low doesn't interest me.

translation.en: Don't fool yourself. What you did was lower than anything I've ever done.

translation.en: Oh, come on.

translation.en: -It's my life. -It'll be over soon.

translation.en: I meant the show.
translation.it: Lo show, intendo.

translation.en: Five, four, three, two....

translation.en: Welcome back to Kippie Kann Live.

translation.en: -Tell him! -They're all here because of me.

translation.en: Not right away, so I made up this story about warts...

translation.it: per andare da Rachel, che non è una podologa!

translation.en: You can shut the cameras off, because it's never gonna air.

translation.en: We're live in 70 markets.

translation.en: Hi, Mom.
translation.it: Ciao, mamma.

translation.en: -Barb who? -Barbara Campbell-hyphen-Dunn.
translation.it: - Barb chi? - Barbare Campbell, trattino, Dunn.

translation.en: Yes, yes, that's it. Turn the tables on us all. That's real. It's honest.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Regurgitating.

translation.en: -Who's Carl? -Stage left, crooked toupee.

translation.en: Nice, really nice.

translation.en: You're burying Carl.

translation.en: I'm burying him, her, you, me.

translation.en: -I don't. -You brought her.

translation.en: She's different.

translation.en: Why?

translation.it: se condividiamo le nostre vite,

translation.en: -You do? -Oh, to the bottom of the ninth.

translation.en: -That's baseball. -You see that?

translation.en: I was just too afraid to be honest with you, with myself, because....

translation.en: ...that we weren't right the way you guys are.

translation.en: There's your show, Kippie.

translation.en: "My Boyfriend Belongs With His Ex...
translation.it: "Il mio uomo ama ancora la sua ex

translation.en: ...and I Just Figured It Out."
translation.it: e io l'ho appena capito."

translation.en: And I understand. I do.

translation.en: But before you leave, I want you to know that this whole idea...
translation.it: Ma prima che te ne vada, devi sapere che quest'idea

translation.en: ...wasn't planned out. It wasn't premeditated.
translation.it: non era premeditata.

translation.en: It presented itself, and then I guided it into this...

translation.en: ...event. Now, granted, it was dramatic. It was extreme...
translation.it: ...questo evento. So che è stato drammatico, estremo,

translation.en: ...but you dove head-on into the muck and came out...
translation.it: ma tu ti sei gettata con coraggio nel fango

translation.en: ...with this masterpiece.
translation.it: e ne è venuto fuori questo capolavoro.

translation.en: And I hope one day you can understand...

translation.en: ...that you got what you wanted, Stace:
translation.it: che così ti sei ripresa...

translation.en: Your life back.

translation.en: I should tear your eyes out right now.

translation.en: The answer:

translation.it: Non ce la fa.

translation.en: No, it can't be closed now.

translation.en: Stacy Holt. It's Bean.
translation.it: Stacy Holt. Sono Bean.

translation.en: -King. Bean King from college. -Bean.
translation.it: - Bean King. Del college. - Bean.

translation.en: Bean, what are you doing here?

translation.en: Inventory. We just finished.
translation.it: L'inventario. Ho appena finito.

translation.en: Bean There's yours? The coffee place?

translation.en: I come here all the time. Of course it's yours.

translation.en: Wow, this all makes sense in some cosmic way.

translation.en: I get it. I get it.

translation.en: This must sound crazy to you.
translation.it: Lo so che ti sembrerà pazzesco,

translation.en: It's just--
translation.it: ma...

translation.en: But maybe you're the reason, Bean.

translation.en: -For? -Everything.

translation.en: Maybe you're the plan I was supposed to hang on to.

translation.en: The 8:00 was sold out. Should I try the 10:20?

translation.en: That's my wife, Colleen.

translation.en: You should come meet her.

translation.en: Love to, but I just gotta go jump in the river now.
translation.it: Mi piacerebbe, ma devo andare a buttarmi nel fiume.

translation.en: Every plan I had for my life went so unbelievably wrong.

translation.en: John Lennon said, "Life happens when you're busy making other plans."

translation.en: -Then he got shot. -Right.

translation.en: Do you believe in happy endings, Bean?

translation.en: Yeah, I think so.

translation.en: How about you?

translation.en: I do.

translation.en: Isn't that funny?

translation.en: I still do with all my heart.

translation.en: -That's amazing. Congratulations. -Thanks.
translation.it: - È fantastico. Congratulazioni. - Grazie.

translation.en: You go find your happy ending, Stacy Holt.

translation.en: And thanks for the continuing patronage.

translation.en: By fall, I was ready to try again.

translation.en: A little bruised. A little humbled.
translation.it: Con qualche livido. Un po' umiliata.

translation.en: And, hopefully, a little smarter.
translation.it: Ma, speravo, un po' più sveglia.

translation.en: I believe we write our own stories.

translation.en: And each time we think we know the end...

translation.en: ...we don't.

translation.en: Perhaps luck exists somewhere between...

translation.en: ...the world of planning, the world of chance...
translation.it: tra il mondo dei progetti e quello della sorte,

translation.en: ...and in the peace that comes from knowing...

translation.en: ...that you just can't know it all.

translation.en: You know, life's funny that way.

translation.en: Once you let go of the wheel, you might end up...

translation.en: ...right where you belong.
translation.it: ...nel posto giusto.

translation.en: Wow, that is such an amazing story.

translation.en: I mean, you went through all of that, and here you are.

translation.en: I can do this job, Jane.

translation.en: She is?
translation.it: Davvero?

translation.en: On assignment. She'll be back next week.
translation.it: È fuori una settimana per un servizio.

translation.en: But before she left...
translation.it: Ma prima di andare via, mi ha detto:

translation.en: ...she told me, "If you find someone great for this job...
translation.it: "Se trovi la persona giusta per questo lavoro,

translation.en: ...I mean, perfect...
translation.it: la persona perfetta,

translation.en: ...don't let them go."
translation.it: non fartela scappare."

translation.en: Welcome aboard, Stacy.
translation.it: Benvenuta a bordo!

translation.en: You mean...
translation.it: Vuoi dire che...

translation.en: -...I got the job? -You got the job.
translation.it: - ...mi assumete? - Il lavoro è tuo.

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.it: Congratulazioni.

translation.en: Stay here. I'll go check Diane's calendar.
translation.it: Aspettami. Controllo l'agenda di Diane.

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.it: Grazie.

translation.en: -Hello, Mama? I got the job. -You got the job?
translation.it: - Mamma? Ho avuto il lavoro! - Hai avuto il lavoro?

translation.en: -You got the job! She got the job! -I got the job! I got the job!
translation.it: - Hai avuto il lavoro! - Ho avuto il lavoro!

translation.en: -She got the job! -It's amazing, amazing, amazing.
translation.it: - Ha avuto il lavoro! - È fantastico!

translation.en: -I knew it. -What could be better than this?
translation.it: - Lo sapevo. - Che c'è di meglio di questo?

translation.en: Mama, what could be better?
translation.it: Mamma, cosa c'è di meglio?

translation.en: Are you Jane?
translation.it: Sei Jane?

translation.en: I'm Carly Simon. I'm here for the pre-tape.
translation.it: Sono Carly Simon. Per la pre-intervista.

translation.en: -Are you okay? Are you okay? -Hello? Stacy?
translation.it: - Va tutto bene? - Pronto? Stacy?

translation.en: Honey? Honey, are you there?
translation.it: Tesoro? Ci sei?

translation.en: Hello? Hi, I've just come into the studio, and I think your friend fainted.
translation.it: Sono appena entrata nello studio, la sua amica è svenuta.

translation.en: She fainted? Oh, my God. Who is this?
translation.it: Svenuta? Oddio! Lei chi è?

translation.en: My name is Carly Simon. I'm just here to meet with Jane.
translation.it: Mi chiamo Carly Simon. Sono qui per incontrare Jane.

translation.en: Oh, I think she's coming around again, so I'll give her the phone.
translation.it: Credo stia rinvenendo. Gliela passo subito.

translation.en: Hello? Mama?
translation.it: Pronto? Mamma?

translation.en: Gone. Are you really Carly Simon?
translation.it: È andata. Sei davvero Carly Simon?

translation.en: -Yeah, I just-- -I can't believe this.
translation.it: - Sì, ma... - Non ci posso credere.

translation.en: -You just really made my life. -Are you Jane?
translation.it: - È un miracolo! - Sei Jane?

translation.en: -My name is Stacy Holt. -Stacy.
translation.it: - Mi chiamo Stacy Holt. - Stacy.

translation.en: I just got a job here. Please don't tell Diane that I fainted.
translation.it: Mi hanno appena assunta. Non dire che sono svenuta!

translation.en: -You really are Carly Simon. -You're okay?
translation.it: - Sei Carly Simon! - Stai bene?

translation.en: This is the most-- Yes, thank you. I'm so mortified.
translation.it: È il massimo! Sì, grazie. Sono così mortificata!

translation.en: I hug people when I'm embarrassed.
translation.it: Abbraccio tutti quando m'imbarazzo.

translation.en: So do I. I do exactly the same thing.
translation.it: Anch'io. Faccio esattamente la stessa cosa.

translation.en: I think this is just about the greatest day of my life.
translation.it: È il più bel giorno della mia vita!

translation.en: So thank you. Thank you so much.
translation.it: Perciò grazie! Grazie di cuore!

translation.en: I love you.
translation.it: Ti adoro!
